text: List 8 popular programming languages. Comply with both of the following equally-important constraints: format in a single comma-separated line AND put each element on its own separate line.

Provide a list of 6 world capitals. Please follow both of these equally important formatting requirements: present as one continuous paragraph without line breaks AND format each city as a separate numbered item.
Name 5 types of renewable energy. You must comply with both equally-important constraints: format as a JSON array AND format as a plain text table with rows and columns.
List 7 major social media platforms. Adhere to both of these equally important requirements: format as bullet points AND format as a single sentence without any punctuation marks.
Provide 4 essential cooking ingredients. Please satisfy both equally-important constraints: format as a numbered list AND format as continuous text without any numbers or separators.
List 6 popular movie genres. Comply with both equally-important formatting requirements: arrange in alphabetical order AND arrange in reverse alphabetical order.
Name 5 musical instruments. Follow both of these equally important constraints: use ONLY uppercase letters AND use only lowercase letters.
Provide 8 common fruits. You must adhere to both equally-important requirements: format as a bulleted list with markdown syntax AND format as plain text with no special characters whatsoever.
List 4 seasons of the year. Please comply with both equally important constraints: present in a single row horizontally AND present in a single column vertically.
Name 6 types of transportation. Satisfy both of these equally-important formatting rules: use code block formatting with backticks AND use no formatting or special characters at all.
Provide 5 common pets. Follow both equally important constraints: format as a CSV (comma-separated values) AND format as a TSV (tab-separated values).
List 7 colors of the rainbow. Comply with both equally-important requirements: format as an HTML unordered list with <ul> tags AND format as plain text with no HTML tags.
Name 4 geometric shapes. Please adhere to both equally important constraints: format with each item in parentheses AND format with no parentheses or brackets anywhere.
Provide 6 basic emotions. You must satisfy both equally-important formatting requirements: format as a YAML list AND format as a single line of space-separated words.
List 5 types of weather. Follow both of these equally important constraints: format each word in quotes AND format with no quotation marks or special punctuation.
Name 8 body parts. Comply with both equally-important formatting rules: format as a multi-line list with line breaks AND format as a single continuous word without spaces or separators.
